
read-job
********


DESCRIPTION
===========

To get detailed information about a job, send a GET request to the
>>``<</2012-09-25/jobs/*[jobId]* `` resource.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws elastictranscoder read-job
     --id <value>


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--id"  (string)
   The identifier of the job for which you want to get detailed
   information.


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

None
